column4: what the hell happened to this channel??? Where are the adults?  kickbans for questions?  this is nuts
pushing debian for no good reason, he's asking for support with ubuntu, no recommend a different distro
Actually he just mentioned wanting a different distro
because he can't get ubuntu to work
no-one wants to boot you, please just try to focus on resolving th ubuntu issues
I will answer questions how I like.  Boot me.  It's what I expect from this community.
if someone asks me about another distro  I'm going to tell them.
then you'll be offtopic, so please don't
how can it be off topic when someone asks me?
because this channel is for ubuntu support only, not general linux questions
it's support to describe how a distro differs from the one you are using, especially if that distro doesn't have the same problems you're seeing.
Are you seriously going to argue that I can't compare distros?
